info.name: JWT Cookie Auth
info.summary: Auto-login users via JWT token from cookie
info.description:
This app allows automatic Single-Sign-On for users when Nextcloud is embedded in an iframe. It reads a JWT token from a configurable cookie, validates it against a public key, and automatically logs in the matching Nextcloud user.
Ideal for embedding Nextcloud in portal applications that use Keycloak or similar OIDC providers.
## Configuration
Add the following to your config.php:
```php 'jwtcookieauth' => [ 'cookie_name' => 'authToken', 'public_key' => '/path/to/keycloak-public-key.pem', 'algorithm' => 'RS256', 'user_claim' => 'preferred_username', // or 'email' 'issuer' => 'https://my.netzint.de/auth/realms/edulution', // optional: validate issuer ], ```
